alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sierra County through 230 PM MDT... At 200 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Arrey, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
